text: Begonia socotrana is a species of plant in the family Begoniaceae. It is endemic to Yemen. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry forests, subtropical or tropical dry shrubland, and rocky areas. ==References== socotrana Category:Endemic flora of Socotra Category:Least concern plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Plants described in 1881
title: Begonia socotrana
